name: Paleo and Vegan Sunflower Banana Muffins
author: icanteatwhat
summary: Here's a totally delicious way to start your day, or pack some in your lunch box. These are my egg free way of enjoying one of my favorite muffins. These are also tree-nut free for those that don't tolerate tree nuts. Your monkeys will love them, too!
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease 6 muffin cups or line with paper liners
Stir water and flax seed meal together in a bowl and let thicken, about 5 minutes
Blend bananas in a blender until smooth
Transfer bananas to a bowl and stir in sunflower butter, coconut flour, maple syrup, vanilla extract, apple cider vinegar, and baking powder
Stir flax seed mixture into banana mixture until batter is thick
Spoon batter into prepared cups, filling to the top
Bake in preheated oven until brown, about 15 minutes
